name: Detective Bamboozled
description:
This game was developed in 7 days for the "No Shit Sherlock Jam 2018" by:

- Francisco Segura (https://twitter.com/fvsegura): Art 

- Alex Lopez (https://twitter.com/ALop23_): Programming

- Jaime Muela Pérez (https://twitter.com/jaimuepe): Programming

- Álvaro Romero (https://twitter.com/AlvatrossKid): Music and sound effects
